response.answer_text: That would be us, Homo Sapiens. Our original homeland before 65k years ago was Africa. Then we settled other continents. By c. 50k years ago we colonized Australia. By c. 35k we settled Europe. By c.17k years ago we settled the Americas. But we are the 3rd wave of hominids to leave Africa. C. 2 million years aago. Homo Erectus colonized Eurasia. Unfortunately they evolved into 3 foot “hobbits” and died out by c. 50k years ago. The second wave left c. 600k years ago. They evolved into Neanderthals and Denisovans. When we ran into them. We had sex with them. Pure Neanderthals disappeared by c. 40k years ago. As late as c.17k years ago Homo Sapiens interbred with Denisovans in New Guinea.
